「今日はことねの為に、声出せる～？」\r\n: Can you make some noise for lil ol' me today～?
「その調子で、よろしく！」\r\n: Keep it up just like that, okay～!
みなさんに 大事なお知らせです\r\n: Attention everyone～! We have a super important announcement!
「しゅき」及び「だいしゅき」以外の言葉を・・・\r\n:
any words other than “shuki” and “dai shuki”...<line-height=25%>
<size=15><color=#FFD203>TL note: しゅき is basically “suki” (like) but pronounced in a cuter, more baby-talk way. imagine saying it with sparkly eyes and a head tilt. だいしゅき is the turbo-charged version (“daisuki”), like telling someone you love them so much you’d share your tonkatsu with them... even if it’s the last bite...</size>
禁止します！！\r\n:
are banned!!<line-height=25%>
<size=15><color=#FFD203>TL note: しゅき is basically “suki” (like) but pronounced in a cuter, more baby-talk way. imagine saying it with sparkly eyes and a head tilt. だいしゅき is the turbo-charged version (“daisuki”), like telling someone you love them so much you’d share your tonkatsu with them... even if it’s the last bite...</size>
（しゅきしゅきだいしゅき～っ）<br>はい よくできました はーと\r\n: (Shuki-shuki dai shuki～!) Yay～ well done～ heart～
・・・あ 今のは練習だから\r\n: ...Ah, that was just the warm up～
<size=40>本番はこの１００倍の「しゅき」 お願いしま～す♪</size>: <size=40>For the real thing, I want 100x more “shuki,” okay～♪</size>
生きてると なんか いろいろあるし～・・・<br>（しゅっ きっ）\r\n: When you’re living, lots of stuff happens～ (Shuki)
自信がなくなっちゃうときだってあるし～・・・<br>（しゅきっしゅきっ）\r\n: Sometimes you just lose your confidence (Shuki-shuki)
たまには弱音吐きたくもなるよ～・・・<br>（しゅっ きっ）\r\n: Sometimes you wanna whine a little～ (Shuki)
そんなあたしって どうかなぁ・・・<br>（しゅきっしゅきっ）\r\n: What do you think of me when I’m like that...? (Shuki-shuki)
サビはみんなに歌ってもらいましょ～う！\r\n: So let’s have everyone sing the chorus together～!
<size=37>（しゅき しゅき しゅき しゅき だいしゅき）<br>わっしょ: (Shuki, shuki, shuki, shuki, dai shuki) Wasshoi～ wasshoi～!
<size=37>（しゅき しゅき だいしゅき）<br>ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！: (Shuki, shuki, dai shuki) Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai!
こうして今日も 藤田ことねの自己肯定感は\r\n: And so, today too, my self-esteem
